text.description:
I ate my way through Korean traditional markets only eating the best korean street food in Seoul. I went to shinchang market located in north east of seoul and gwangjang market. I recommend you go check out shinchang market when you're in Seoul because it's not crowded and you'll be able to get a taste for local street delights. Gwangjang market is also definitely a place you need to go visit, but the real tip is to go later at night to avoid the crowds and enjoy the ~real vibes~

text.fulltitle: Eating the BEST KOREAN STREET FOOD in SEOUL
text.tags: vlog; foodie; korean; korea; street food; korean street food; gwangjang market; tteokbokki; korean fried chicken; local; seoul; where to eat in seoul; what i eat in a day; what i ate for lunch in korea; school; traditional markets; documentary; mark wiens; mukbang; food vlogs; travel; japan; markets; where to go in seoul; what to do in seoul; seoul itinerary; authentic; korean street food best; best; best ever food review show; anthony bourdaine;
